report.title: Speedball Testing
report.author: Zenix M.
report.bodytext: A while back I ordered some dimethocaine. There was not much info on this substance. So I decided to contribute. Preliminary tests proved that intranasally, this substance did feel a lot like cocaine. Mild euphoria and moderate stimulation. It was better than bad cocaine, but not as good as amazing coke. /n /n I decided to see it would replace the speedball. I put the last 150 mgs in solution and added one bag of 'Overdose' brand heroin. /n /n :30 seconds warm feelings, sense of stimulation /n :01 realized that there was not going to be a rush or any audio flanging. /n :10 On irc, kind of disappointed /n :30 Just feeling the heroin. /n /n In conclusion, I feel that dimethocaine was interesting. But not altogether fulfilling. I'd do it again. But I wouldn't go out of my way to.
